CustomField.description: CB Trial End Dt calculates either 15 or 30 Days after the Date trial Extended, based on whether the picklist value for 15 days or 30 days was selected.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: CB Trial End Dt calculates either 15 or 30 Days after the Date trial Extended, based on whether the picklist value for 15 days or 30 days was selected.
CustomField.label: ClientBooks Trial End Date
